attributes.action: Legislate that all new build housing stock include 'super insulation', solar power & grey water systems
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to help meet our carbon emissions target this is a justifiable campaign to promote a sustainable future with any premiums incurred on the property price being offset by savings on energy costs in the long term.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
